game.name: Can You Escape: The Collection
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A collection of 23 classic escape games brought to Steam, featuring puzzles and hidden objects across various locations. Perfect for fans revisiting these old favorites.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A collection of 23 classic escape games brought to Steam, featuring puzzles and hidden objects across various locations. Perfect for fans revisiting these old favorites.
